content: summertime bucket hat created by crochet&copy summertime bucket hat materials 1 skeins of peaches & creme yarn color ecru medium 4 100% cotton 1 skeins of peaches & creme yarn color spring blue stripes medium 4 100% cotton crochet hook size g-6/4 00 mm stitch markers yarn needle scissors stitches/abbreviations chain s = chain s st s = stitch es single_crochet = single_crochet blo = back loop only skip = skip slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet repeat = repeat work directions in brackets the number of times specified notes main color yarn - peaches & creme yarn color ecru new color yarn - peaches & creme yarn color spring blue stripes when the pattern states to join it simple means to slip_stitch to the beginning stitch so to start the new round we will place the first stitch of that round in the joining stitch magic_ring = wrap yarn into a ring ensuring that the tail falls behind the working yarn grip ring and tail between middle finger and thumb insert hook through center of ring yarn over with working yarn and draw up a loop work stitches of the first round in the ring after the first round of stitches are worked pull gently on tail to tighten ring changing color - when the pattern indicates a change color work last stitch of old color to last yarn over yarn over with new color and draw through all loops on hook proceed with new color when pattern states break yarn it simple means to cut the yarn but leave a tail to tuck/weave in make sure to put the stitch marker in first stitch of each round pay attention if a round starts with turning or not turning and if the round finishes with joining or not joining if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial link below measurements one size to fit most adults instructions note crown do not turn or join mark first stitch with stitch marker with main color yarn round 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch work 10 half_double_crochet in the ring mark first stitch with stitch marker do not join total of 10 sts round 2 2 half_double_crochet in each st around total of 20 sts round 3 1 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 9 more times total 30 sts round 4 1 half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 9 more times total 40 sts round 5 1 half_double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 9 more times total 50 sts round 6 1 half_double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 9 more times total 60 sts round 7 1 half_double_crochet in next 5 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat work
